items.sentence: I told her once and for all that I would not go shopping with her.
An old friend of mine dropped in on me for the first time in ages.
Tom tried his best to move the table by himself, but he couldn\'t.
We have to figure out a way to make Tom do what we want him to do.
Tom is the only person I know who doesn\'t like watching baseball.
Tom isn\'t the only one who has to study. I have to study as well.
Tom wants Mary to take the medication the doctor told her to take.
Tom was able to speak three languages by the time he was thirteen.
Tom was adopted by a couple in Boston when he was three years old.
Tom was determined to continue his support for as long as it took.
